lead_paragraph: CHASIN--Dr. Mark, 73. On January 22, 2016 of Monroe, NJ, formerly of Manalapan, NJ. Pre-deceased by his wife Rena in 2003, now beloved husband to Reva SternChasin, amazing father to Jeff (Lisa), Larry (Andrea), and Marni (Lee) and adored grandfather of Shelby Chasin, Samara Chasin, Jake Garfinkle, Jack Chasin, William Chasin and Ryan Garfinkle. Mark grew up in Merrick, NY, graduated from Cornell University (B.S.) and Michigan State (PhD) and dedicated his life to developing new medicines and drug delivery methods. Our world is forever changed. 1/3
